lead_paragraph: Elias Lindholm scored twice, Cam Ward made 35 saves and the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-1 on Friday night.

headline.main: Lindholm Has 2 Goals, Hurricanes Over Blue Jackets 4-1
headline.print_headline: Lindholm Has 2 Goals, Hurricanes Over Blue Jackets 4-1

snippet: Elias Lindholm scored twice, Cam Ward made 35 saves and the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-1 on Friday night....
